changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM ADM_REGION_GADM

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COORDINATE_RING T SET (T.MIN_LONGITUDE, T.MAX_LONGITUDE, T.MIN_LATITUDE, T.MAX_LATITUDE) = ( SELECT MIN(C.LONGITUDE), MAX(C.LONGITUDE), MIN(C.LATITUDE), MAX(C.LATITUDE) FROM COORDINATE_RING CR INNER JOIN COORDINATE C ON C.RING_ID = CR.ID AND C.DELETED = 0 WHERE CR.DELETED = 0 AND CR.ID = T.ID ) WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM COORDINATE_RING CR INNER JOIN COORDINATE C ON C.RING_ID = CR.ID AND C.DELETED = 0 WHERE CR.DELETED = 0 AND CR.ID = T.ID );

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ENCODED_COORDS_STR (ID, RING_ID, VALUE, DELETED, LAST_UPDATED, LAST_UPDATED_BY) SELECT SEQ_ENCODED_COORDS_STR.NEXTVAL, ID, ENCODED_COORDINATES_STRING, 0, SYSTIMESTAMP, 'admin' FROM COORDINATE_RING;

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COORDINATE_RING CR SET ENCODED_COORDS_STR_ID = (SELECT ECS.ID FROM ENCODED_COORDS_STR ECS WHERE ECS.RING_ID = CR.ID);

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ENCODED_COORDS_STR ECS SET RING_ID = (SELECT CR.ID FROM COORDINATE_RING CR WHERE CR.ENCODED_COORDS_STR_ID = ECS.ID);

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE COORDINATE_RING CR SET ENCODED_COORDS_STR_ID = (SELECT ECS.ID FROM ENCODED_COORDS_STR ECS WHERE ECS.RING_ID = CR.ID);

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP (ID, NAME, LAT, LNG, DELETED, LAST_UPDATED, LAST_UPDATED_BY) SELECT ID, NAME, LAT, LNG, 0, SYSTIMESTAMP, 'admin' FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TEMP;

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TYPES (PARENT_ID, TYPE) SELECT T.ID, LRL.FROM_LOCATION_TYPE FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TEMP T INNER JOIN LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG LRL ON LRL.FROM_LOCATION_ID = T.LOCATION_ID UNION SELECT T.ID, LRL.TO_LOCATION_TYPE FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TEMP T INNER JOIN LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG LRL ON LRL.TO_LOCATION_ID = T.LOCATION_ID;

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG LRL SET FROM_ID = (SELECT T.ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TEMP T WHERE T.LOCATION_ID = LRL.FROM_LOCATION_ID);

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG LRL SET TO_ID = (SELECT T.ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TEMP T WHERE T.LOCATION_ID = LRL.TO_LOCATION_ID);

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE LR SET FROM_ID = (SELECT T.ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TEMP T WHERE T.LOCATION_ID = LR.FROM_LOCATION_ID);

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE LR SET TO_ID = (SELECT T.ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG_STOP_TEMP T WHERE T.LOCATION_ID = LR.TO_LOCATION_ID);

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE LHAUL_ROUTE MODIFY FROM_ID NULL;

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE LHAUL_ROUTE MODIFY TO_ID NULL;

changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE_FRAG F SET FROM_ID = (SELECT L.FROM_ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG L WHERE L.ID = F.LEG_ID) WHERE F.LEG_ID IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE_FRAG F SET TO_ID = (SELECT L.TO_ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE_LEG L WHERE L.ID = F.LEG_ID) WHERE F.LEG_ID IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE_FRAG F SET FROM_ID = (SELECT R.FROM_ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE R WHERE R.ID = F.ROUTE_ID) WHERE F.ROUTE_ID IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: Eray Oral
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LHAUL_ROUTE_FRAG F SET TO_ID = (SELECT R.TO_ID FROM LHAUL_ROUTE R WHERE R.ID = F.ROUTE_ID) WHERE F.ROUTE_ID IS NOT NULL;
